attributes.description: Overview of Issue logs in Cyera

params.markdown:
#### Cyera

#### Overview

This dashboard provides visibility into issues detected within Cyera, showing the total number of issues along with breakdowns by severity, status, and risk status. It highlights trends of issues over time, top affected providers, infrastructures, and regions, as well as owners and frameworks tied to risks. A risk details panel and essential details view present issue-level context to support faster triage, compliance alignment, and effective remediation.

**[Integration Page](/app/integrations/detail/cyera/overview)**
